detail.reasoning: The given text states that Gary Smith won the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences in 2018. However, the provided evidences consistently indicate that the 2018 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences was awarded to William D. Nordhaus and Paul M. Romer. There is no mention of Gary Smith in any of the evidences related to the 2018 prize.
